title: Pixel 4a keeps glitching/doing its own thing
content:
So my pixel 4a keeps doing its own thing, when I say this is mean it doesn't want to click where I click. Sometimes it might close the app or jump on a different section or even freeze when I'm swiping away pages. 

I've tried 
- safe mode 
- reset 
- power down
- removed my screen protector

Please help, really love this phone and don't want to have to bring it in.
